title: [Neuroscience] First study to relate severity of autism spectrum disorder (ASD) symptoms to gut microbiome composition in people over time. Some behaviors, such as lethargy/social withdrawal and inappropriate speech, changed along with changes in the gut microbiome.

[Health] Study finds that the frequency of cosmetics and personal care product utilization is a strong predictor of exposure to certain endocrine disruptors (benzophenones and parabens) that may increase the risk of endometriosis
